TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Receive extends System.Activities.Activity
Public NotInheritable Class Receive Inherits Activity
public ref class Receive sealed : System::Activities::Activity

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive> 活動可以接收單一項目或多個項目，視所使用的接收內容型別而定。
> [!WARNING] > 當工作流程包含多個具有相同作業名稱的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive> 活動時，<xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive.CorrelatesOn%2A> 屬性必須設定至相同的相互關聯查詢集合。
## Examples 下列範例將示範如何建立 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive> 活動並以程式碼的形式，將它加入至工作流程。
[!code-csharp[SendReceiveParameters#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/sendreceiveparameters/cs/echoworkflowservice/program.cs#0)]
下列範例將示範如何建立 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive> 活動並以 XAML 的形式，將它加入至工作流程服務。
```xaml <WorkflowService mc:Ignorable="sap" ConfigurationName="Service1" Name="Service1" mva:VisualBasic.Settings="Assembly references and imported namespaces serialized as XML namespaces" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/netfx/2009/xaml/servicemodel" xmlns:mc="http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/markup-compatibility/2006" xmlns:mv="clr-namespace:Microsoft.VisualBasic;assembly=System" xmlns:mva="clr-namespace:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities;assembly=System.Activities" xmlns:p="http://schemas.microsoft.com/netfx/2009/xaml/activities" xmlns:s="clr-namespace:System;assembly=mscorlib" xmlns:s1="clr-namespace:System;assembly=System" xmlns:s2="clr-namespace:System;assembly=System.Xml" xmlns:s3="clr-namespace:System;assembly=System.Core" xmlns:sad="clr-namespace:System.Activities.Debugger;assembly=System.Activities" xmlns:sap="http://schemas.microsoft.com/netfx/2009/xaml/activities/presentation" xmlns:scg="clr-namespace:System.Collections.Generic;assembly=System" xmlns:scg1="clr-namespace:System.Collections.Generic;assembly=System.ServiceModel" xmlns:scg2="clr-namespace:System.Collections.Generic;assembly=System.Core" xmlns:scg3="clr-namespace:System.Collections.Generic;assembly=mscorlib" xmlns:sd="clr-namespace:System.Data;assembly=System.Data" xmlns:sl="clr-namespace:System.Linq;assembly=System.Core" xmlns:ssa="clr-namespace:System.ServiceModel.Activities;assembly=System.ServiceModel.Activities" xmlns:st="clr-namespace:System.Text;assembly=mscorlib" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml"> <p:Sequence sad:XamlDebuggerXmlReader.FileName="c:\Projects\WFServiceSnippets\WFServiceSnippets\Service1.xamlx" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="277,644" mva:VisualBasic.Settings="Assembly references and imported namespaces serialized as XML namespaces"> <p:Sequence.Variables> <p:Variable x:TypeArguments="CorrelationHandle" Name="__handle1" /> <p:Variable x:TypeArguments="x:String" Name="Message" /> <p:Variable x:TypeArguments="x:String" Name="Echo" /> </p:Sequence.Variables> <sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <scg3:Dictionary x:TypeArguments="x:String, x:Object"> <x:Boolean x:Key="IsExpanded">True</x:Boolean> </scg3:Dictionary> </sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <Receive x:Name="__ReferenceID0" CanCreateInstance="True" DisplayName="ReceiveString" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="255,90" OperationName="Echo" ServiceContractName="Echo"> <Receive.CorrelationInitializers> <RequestReplyCorrelationInitializer CorrelationHandle="[__handle1]" /> </Receive.CorrelationInitializers> <ReceiveParametersContent> <p:OutArgument x:TypeArguments="x:String" x:Key="message">[Message]</p:OutArgument> </ReceiveParametersContent> </Receive> <p:WriteLine sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="255,61" Text="["Message received: " + Message]" /> <p:Assign sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="255,58"> <p:Assign.To> <p:OutArgument x:TypeArguments="x:String">[Echo]</p:OutArgument> </p:Assign.To> <p:Assign.Value> <p:InArgument x:TypeArguments="x:String">["<echo> " + Message]</p:InArgument> </p:Assign.Value> </p:Assign> <SendReply Request="{x:Reference __ReferenceID0}" DisplayName="SendReply" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="255,90"> <SendParametersContent> <p:InArgument x:TypeArguments="x:String" x:Key="echo">[Echo]</p:InArgument> </SendParametersContent> </SendReply> <p:WriteLine sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="255,61" Text="["Message sent: " + Echo]" /> </p:Sequence> </WorkflowService>
```

Docs.summary: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

remarks.format:
## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用這個建構函式。
[!code-csharp[SendReceiveParameters#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/sendreceiveparameters/cs/echoworkflowservice/program.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Action { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Action : string with get, set

Docs.summary: 取得或設定訊息動作標頭的值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive.Action%2A> 屬性未明確設定，則預設其值為：`https://tempuri.org/{service contract namespace}/{service contract name}/{operation name}`。

Protected Overrides Sub CacheMetadata (metadata As ActivityMetadata)
public: property bool CanCreateInstance { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CanCreateInstance : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出如果訊息與現有的工作流程執行個體之間不具有相互關聯，是否要建立新的工作流程執行個體來處理該訊息。
Docs.value: 如果已建立新的工作流程執行個體來處理訊息，則為 ，否則為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`true`，來處理訊息，如果未與現有的工作流程執行個體相互關聯訊息建立新的工作流程執行個體。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::Activities::ReceiveContent ^ Content { System::ServiceModel::Activities::ReceiveContent ^ get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Activities::ReceiveContent ^ value); };

Docs.summary: 取得或設定要接收的資料。 內容可以是 或 。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::MessageQuerySet ^ CorrelatesOn { System::ServiceModel::MessageQuerySet ^ get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::MessageQuerySet ^ value); };
member this.CorrelatesOn : System.ServiceModel.MessageQuerySet with get, set

Docs.summary: 取得或設定用於查詢訊息，以擷取相互關聯資料的 。
Docs.value: 用於從傳入訊息擷取相互關聯資料的一組訊息查詢。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property CorrelatesWith As InArgument(Of CorrelationHandle)

public: property System::Activities::InArgument<System::ServiceModel::Activities::CorrelationHandle ^> ^ CorrelatesWith { System::Activities::InArgument<System::ServiceModel::Activities::CorrelationHandle ^> ^ get(); void set(System::Activities::InArgument<System::ServiceModel::Activities::CorrelationHandle ^> ^ value); };

Docs.summary: 取得或設定相互關聯控制代碼，此控制代碼會用於將訊息路由至適當的工作流程執行個體。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CorrelationInitializers As Collection(Of CorrelationInitializer)

Docs.summary: 取得相互關聯初始設定式的集合，這個集合會在執行 活動的情況下初始化以查詢為主的內容、回呼內容或要求-回覆相互關聯。
Docs.value: 相互關聯初始設定式的集合。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive FromOperationDescription(class System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription operation) cil managed
Public Shared Function FromOperationDescription (operation As OperationDescription) As Receive

Docs.summary: 傳回從指定合約作業描述的接收活動。
Docs.returns: 來自指定之合約作業描述的 物件。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property KnownTypes As Collection(Of Type)

Docs.summary: 取得作業之已知型別的集合。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性應該與 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> 搭配使用。 如果使用 <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>，則會忽略此項。 如需已知型別的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料合約已知型別](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/data-contract-known-types.md)。 這個屬性中指定的已知型別會加入這個作業對應之 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.KnownTypes%2A> 的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription> 集合中。

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void OnCreateDynamicUpdateMap (System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.UpdateMapMetadata metadata, System.Activities.Activity originalActivity);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnCreateDynamicUpdateMap(class System.Activities.DynamicUpdate.UpdateMapMetadata metadata, class System.Activities.Activity originalActivity) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnCreateDynamicUpdateMap (metadata As UpdateMapMetadata, originalActivity As Activity)
protected: override void OnCreateDynamicUpdateMap(System::Activities::DynamicUpdate::UpdateMapMetadata ^ metadata, System::Activities::Activity ^ originalActivity);
public: property System::String ^ OperationName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.OperationName : string with get, set

Docs.summary: 取得或設定 所實作之作業的名稱。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未設定 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive.OperationName%2A> 屬性，便會擲回例外狀況。 若未明確設定 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive.Action%2A> 屬性，則會使用作業名稱建構 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive.Action%2A> 屬性的預設值。 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive.OperationName%2A> 是這個作業之 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Name%2A> 的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription>。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property ProtectionLevel As Nullable(Of ProtectionLevel)

public: property Nullable<System::Net::Security::ProtectionLevel> ProtectionLevel { Nullable<System::Net::Security::ProtectionLevel> get(); void set(Nullable<System::Net::Security::ProtectionLevel> value); };

Docs.summary: 取得或設定值，這個值表示該作業的保護層級。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會設定為其中一個 <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel> 列舉值。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::Activities::SerializerOption SerializerOption { System::ServiceModel::Activities::SerializerOption get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Activities::SerializerOption value); };

Docs.summary: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定這個作業所使用的序列化程式。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設的序列化程式是 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer>。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::Linq::XName ^ ServiceContractName { System::Xml::Linq::XName ^ get(); void set(System::Xml::Linq::XName ^ value); };
member this.ServiceContractName : System.Xml.Linq.XName with get, set

Docs.summary: 取得或設定服務合約的名稱。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會用於將服務作業群組為個別的服務合約。 具有相同 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive> 的所有 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Receive.ServiceContractName%2A> 活動都會群組於相同的服務合約 (WSDL PortType)。 這個屬性預設為工作流程服務的名稱。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool ShouldSerializeCorrelatesOn() cil managed

Docs.summary: 傳回值，這個值表示 屬性是否已變更為非預設值且應該序列化。
Docs.returns: 如果應序列化 屬性值，則為 ，否則為 。
